overview: Frank (Derrick Pierce), a stern stepfather, discipline her new stepdaughter Caroline (Gia Derza) with spanking, rough anal and gaping. Caroline is stunned and tries to resist, but she feels like she has little choice once Frank reminds her that HE puts the roof over her and her mother's heads. If she doesn't want to be kicked out onto the streets, she WILL be a good girl and submit to him. Selina (Dava Foxx) and her son Ray (Rion King) have a plan together. Selina helps her son seduce a wealthy widow named Bridget (Natasha Nice) in order to steal valuables from her. Everything seems to be going exactly as planned for Ray and Selina.
title: Teaching Her Some Discipline
